page.title: 18ARTS AND CRAFTS OF BURLEY
page.content: In Burley we have an Art Club.The old ladies go out in cars and paint pictures of the trees and ponies.The Burley Pottery Shop makes pots and plates.They paint them by hand.There is a shop called the Craft Gallery that sells hand knitted jumpers,raffia woven owls and animal furs.Drama youth club is a craft.The children learn plays and songs and act them out in summer and winter.Some people who are carvers make animals.They sell them in shops.In the "Coven of Witches"they sell lavender bags and china models that are hand made.The ladies also make spoon ladies and ragdolls.The Saddlery Shop in Burley mends saddles and other tack and sells it.There is a lady in the village who grows flowers and sells them.In the"Sorceror's Apprentice" they make rope table mats and baskets.
